hero.heading: San Francisco Software Engineer
hero.subheading: Currently building a verified platform for SMBs, Jackson is a software engineer, technology consultant, and full-capture proponent. This site presents his writing on software, including [personal projects](/portfolio),, and you can see more [@GitHub](https://github.com/abstractionjackson), or reach out [via email](mailto:hello@abstractionjackson.com) to say hi.
